articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.title: Rivian's R1 vehicles are getting a gut overhaul — here's what's new - The Verge
articles.description: Rivian is reengineering the guts of its R1T and R1S vehicles, removing wiring, replacing motors, and updating its battery tech. It’s a total overhaul for the EV maker.
articles.content: On the surface, the second generation Rivian R1 vehicles look basically the same as the first: same rugged-yet-aerodynamic shape, same friendly oval headlight shapes, same quirky features, like flash… [+12799 chars]

articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.title: Google's updated AI-powered NotebookLM expands to India, UK and over 200 other countries - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has expanded NotebookLM, an AI-powered note-taking assistant, to over 200 new countries and over 100 languages.
articles.content: Google on Thursday said it is rolling out NotebookLM, its AI-powered note-taking assistant, to over 200 new countries, nearly six months after opening its access in the U.S. The platform, powered by … [+3775 chars]
